spec_data.Name: subscription-manager-plugin-container
spec_data.Description:
Enables handling of content of type 'containerImage' in any certificates
from the server. Populates /etc/docker/certs.d appropriately.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 05:25:55 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A plugin for handling container content
